entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
